name: SuggestaRandomPSPlusExtraGame
0:
”Alexa, open random plus extra”
”Alexa, start random plus extra”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random plus extra
des:
Overwhelmed by the huge Playstation Plus Extra lineup and don't know what to play next? Let Alexa choose a random game for you to play next from the current Playstation Plus Extra lineup in your region.

Choose whether you want a game suggestion from all available games or just PS5 or PS4 when Alexa asks you. Then she will suggest a game at random for you to play next including which console it is for (PS5 or PS4).

Updated monthly to add new games added to the service and to remove games removed from the service.

Note: This is an unofficial skill and is in no way affiliated with Playstation services.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
